name: Future Safe 10
flavor_text:
See who's robed as if a god, who stands with pride above the rest!
Destroy this ancient nameless fraud! Destroy the one whose death was blessed!

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy uppercut attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

perks.description: Increased damage at the cost of sword ammo.
perks.name: Jagged Edge

perks.description: Sword Guard has maximized efficiency and high resistance, but low endurance.
perks.name: Burst Guard

perks.description: Quick attacks immediately after swapping to this sword do additional damage.
perks.name: En Garde
